body:
Not quite sure I follow. When `num_strings` is 0, then:

```
TF_SetAttrStringList(d, cname, reinterpret_cast<const void* const*>(strings), lengths, num_strings);
```

amounts to:

```
TF_SetAttrStringList(d, cname, <some pointer>, <some pointer>, 0);
```

which is fine, right?
body_html:
Not quite sure I follow. When num_strings is 0, then:

TF_SetAttrStringList(d, cname, reinterpret_cast<const void* const*>(strings), lengths, num_strings);

amounts to:

TF_SetAttrStringList(d, cname, <some pointer>, <some pointer>, 0);

which is fine, right?
